item.title: The Challenges We Rarely Talk About When Building Startups - Product Hunt
item.description:
The Challenges We Rarely Talk About When Building Startups - Product Hunt

The Challenges We Rarely Talk About When Building Startups Everyone who's attempted to build a startup knows it isn't exactly a walk in the park. It's often embellished in mainstream media (ping pong tables, and free lunches, and sweatpants to work!)-but the realities of startup life are far from glamorous.
